title: My Thunderbird often pauses and stops working.
content: I have several files in my email account. It seems that they keep loading everytime I log in. It takes a long time. What do you suggest?
creator: lico44

title: Links in signature
content:
Hi!

How can I add a hiperlink / link with my Private Policy and Cookies to my signature?

Please send me an instruction.

Attention! - I don't want to link in create message. I wanto link to the file in my signature.

Thanks
creator: biuro299

title: Thunderbird Email and Printing
content:
Thunderbird has suddenly decided that it will split the header and sender information of an email from the text message which means that if I try to print the whole message the header and sender information appears on the first page and the rest of the body of the text is on the following pages even if the message is only one page long.

The message appears correctly when I view it it's only when I go into Print Preview that the separation shows and even if I reduce the margins or remove the header it still splits the first page. The Config Editor appears to be correct in terms of the height and width of the paper being A4.

I'm not sure but I think the system was upgraded recently as this problem only started this week.

Can anyone help me?
creator: post419

title: Carpetas unificadas versión 115
content: He actualizado a la versión 115 y las carpetas unificadas no funcionan correctamente. El problema mayor es con la bandeja de entrada, me aparece vacía y sin la posibilidad de desplegarla para ver las bandejas de entradas de todas las cuentas de manera independiente. Lo mismo me pasa con la de correo no deseado y papelera. Y en una de las cuentas, la carpeta Archives tampoco aparece en las unificadas sino que aparece como una carpeta normal dentro de la cuenta. Este problema, al menos en mi caso, hace inútil la vista de carpetas unificadas. He probado a arrancar en modo seguro por si algún complemento anterior pudiera estar influyendo, peor el comportamiento ha seguido siendo el mismo. Si alguien tiene alguna idea de que puede pasar, se agradecería la ayuda. Saludos.
creator: Hector.D.Rguez

title: Why does my computer open a new tab when I click on a e-mail to open it?
creator: 493mike

title: Printing Issue with latest update
content: After installing the latest version, when I print an email with more than one pages, the first page is blank after the From/To/Subject info. The rest of the mail continues in the second page. How can i fix that? Thank you in advance
creator: am38

title: Indbakke bliver sendt til papirkurv
content:
Hej jeg modtager 20 sparm mail om dagen, og jeg prøver at få slettet dem inde de kommer til min indbakke, jeg ved ikke hvad jeg har gjort, men nu går alt i min indbakken direkte i papirkurv, hvor skal jeg klikke så de mail jeg skal bruge bliver i indbakken.

Mvh Michael Rundstrøm
creator: rundstrom

title: Threaded view does not display most recent messages when clicking the thread
content:
With "Unread Messages" filter and "Order By -> Group By Thread" both enabled, the threaded message view does not display the most recent message in Inbox. When a new reply arrives to the already displayed thread, it is hidden underneath the packed mail thread in message list and the user is unaware of having a more recent reply already available there. After clicking another mail thread and then back again, the most recent reply is still not shown in the message preview sub-window.

I am using the new default "card" view with Thunderbird 115.
creator: lukaschmela

title: Thunderbird dont work with gmail account
content: for about a month now I have not been able to download mail on Thunderbird for the Gmail account Configuration: imap.gmail.com port 993 SSL/TLS Oauth2 I have double authentication, the confirmation request appears on my smartphone, I confirm, insert the password on Thunderbird, accept the conditions and get the error. I also tried to change the password (on Firefox and Chrome I log in regularly, on smartphones too), with Thunderbird 102.13.0 32 bit on windows 11 no.... Below are the screenshots

title: Cannot Find Email Content but Can See Them There
content: I have a problem with Thunderbird Mail. I can search for emails and they show that they are there, but when I click on them, there's not content. I have done the fix using 'repair' mail boxes and that didn't work. I've also gone in and deleted the mfs files on my C drive, still doesn't work. I've deleted the programme and reinstalled, still doesn't work. Any clues as I can't access email conent. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanking you/anyone in advance.

title: Place / configure TB 115's main window's menu bar ABOVE the button toolbar
content: Hi, In TB 102 the menu toolbar was still above the button toolbar, if I am not mistaken. In TB 115 this seems to have changed... I could not find a way to customize it back as it was. Pointers anyone ? Thank you.
creator: Cbhihe

title: passagio a TH 115 e perdita di indirizzi
content: Stamattina sono passato a Thunderbird 115 e, di colpo, non vedo più, nella cartella "posta in arrivo" i 2 inidirizzi di posta POP3 che avevo prima, ma solo quelli IMAP. Solo nel cestino si vede uno dei due indirizzi scomparsi. Aggiungo che, se provo a scrivere un nuovo messaggio, ho la possibilità di usare tutti gli indirizzi. Qualcuno mi può cortesemente aiutare per fare in modo che tutto si veda in modo corretto?
creator: francesco19

title: Thunderbird 115 folder pane colours
content:
Does anyone know how to change the folderpane colours in 115. I use a userChrome.css, which no longer works in 115, as I beleive the commands have changed.

This is what I use currently, but have no idea what changed need to be made to make it work in 115. Any help would be appreciated.


@namespace url("http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul");

/* set default namespace to XUL */


treechildren::-moz-tree-row {margin-bottom: -3px !important;} treechildren::-moz-tree-row(hover), treechildren::-moz-tree-row(selected) {margin-bottom: -2px !important;}

/**/ 

   #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, newMessages-true) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, newMessages-true, selected) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, hasUnreadMessages-true) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, hasUnreadMessages-true, selected) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, closed, subfoldersHaveUnreadMessages-true) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, closed, subfoldersHaveUnreadMessages-true, selected) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, closed, newMessages-true),    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, newMessages-true),    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, specialFolder-Inbox, newMessages-true) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, closed, newMessages-true, selected),    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, newMessages-true, selected),    #folderTree > treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text(folderNameCol, specialFolder-Inbox, newMessages-true, selected) {      font-weight: bold !important;      color: Black !important;    }

/**/'''''''
creator: mrm.one

title: How to keep unified folder (e.g. inbox) visible in favorites after restarting of the TB?
content:
After TB 115 update (maybe sooner) it became possible to put unified folder into favorites. It works quite well that it until restarting the client.

Issue: After restarting the TB unified folder stays marked as favorite but hides in favorite list. To "unhide" the unified folder under favorite folder list I have to uncheck favorite > check favorite on that specific folder.

Conceit question How do i keep unified folder visible under favorite list after restarting the Thunderbird 115 ?

I'm open to use plugin but i would prefer fixing the already implemented feature.
creator: spamovac

title: Thunderbird Coder needed - to turn active account blocked by lost server to local account
content:
I have two mail accounts in Thunderbird that have permanently lost connection to their respective servers. I need to create permanent accessible offline archives of these emails.

Thunderbird cannot archive emails when the server connection is lost. I've tried a plugin export addin, doesn't work. The emails are there on my computer. But I can't access them through my normal profile.

Looking for someone who knows and can modify the basic behaviour of Thunderbird. The task is to modify those two accounts so that Thunderbird profile sees them as a local folder not a standard 'live' mailbox (where it constantly attempts to connect to server and won't allow access to the emails held offline).

The folders are there on my hard drive, but something needs to be done to the profile to recognise them as local folders rather than live accounts. i.e. working like a PST file in Outlook.

Happy to pay consultancy if this needs bespoke coding.
creator: charles119

title: lightning calendar print problems
content:
Two problems have been encountered. Multiple Google calendars are involved. Display works correctly, but: 1. Not all (Google) calendars show on the print. 2. For those calendars that show up, the items show up in their colors on the display, but not on the print.

I normally use the normal release (currently TB 102.13.0), but have also upgraded to 115.0 with the same results.
creator: dougschuess1

title: Hotmail authentication window keeps showing up
content:
Hi,

I updated Thunderbird to the latest 115 version this morning, and a strange microsoftonline.com authentication pop up has been showing up since then every time Thunderbird checks if there's new email from hotmail.com. How do I get rid of this pop up window?

Thanks, Tang
